items.title: Don't skip the effort on the title.
Keywords are more complex than we think.

frontmatter.title: The Ultimate SEO checklist for your website
frontmatter.description: As a developer, you can improve your page rank with a few simple and easy to follow tips. This ultimate SEO series includes different ways to improve web ranking from basics to fairly advanced technical aspects.
frontmatter.keywords: seo optimization, website ranking, keywords, on page seo, content, search engine, optimization
